text: Piney Flats is an unincorporated community in Sullivan County in the U.S. state of Tennessee. It is part of the Kingsport-Bristol (TN)-Bristol (VA) Metropolitan Statistical Area, which is a component of the Johnson City- Kingsport-Bristol, TN-VA Combined Statistical Area - commonly known as the "Tri-Cities" region. Category:Unincorporated communities in Tennessee Category:Tri-Cities, Tennessee Category:Sullivan County, Tennessee
title: Piney Flats, Tennessee
